snippet: Jazz at Lincoln Center has announced that Robert J. Appel, a financier and philanthropist, has pledged $20 million to benefit the organization’s performance, education and broadcasting efforts.
abstract: Jazz at Lincoln Center announces that Robert J Appel, financier and philanthropist, has pledged $20 million to benefit the organization’s performance, education and broadcasting efforts.
lead_paragraph: Jazz at Lincoln Center has announced that Robert J. Appel, a financier and philanthropist, has pledged $20 million to benefit the organization’s performance, education and broadcasting efforts.

headline.print_headline: $20 Million Donation For Jazz at Lincoln Center
headline.main: $20 Million Donation for Jazz at Lincoln Center
